seller_description: Product Description: Packaged in a 11.5oz bottle, each Premier Protein Shake contains 30 grams of protein, complete with all the essential amino acids, 1g of sugar, 3-5g carbs (depending on flavor), 160 calories, 24 vitamins   minerals, and is also low in fat. We use a blend of milk protein and casein in our shakes to help fuel muscles quickly and for several hours to help support your goals. Enjoy a shake as a healthy snack, a breakfast on-the-go, an afternoon snack, or as pre- or post-workout fuel. They are delicious as is but are also highly customizable. Try blending with your favorite fruits and vegetables for a delicious smoothie or adding to cereal or oatmeal. Available in 9 delicious flavors: Cinnamon Roll, Chocolate, Vanilla, Cafe Latte, Caramel, Cookies   Cream, Strawberries   Cream, Bananas   Cream, and Peaches   Cream. Top. Similar Questions Reviews Product details. Product Dimensions : 10.13 x 7.69 x 7.25 inches; 10.7 Pounds. Item model number : 71714. UPC : 643843717140. Manufacturer : Premier Nutrition. ASIN : B07MJL8NXR. Country of Origin : USA
review: The Best Buy date on this is May 2024. It is August 2024.
expected-output: Seller Description Review: The seller provides a clear description of the Pop-Tarts variety pack, containing five boxes with different flavors, including Strawberry, Blueberry, Brown Sugar Cinnamon, and Cookies & Creme. The description emphasizes the versatility of Pop-Tarts as snacks for various occasions and suggests they are ideal for school, work, or on-the-go moments. The promise includes Pop-Tarts that can be enjoyed in multiple ways, such as toasted, microwaved, or eaten directly from the package. Customer Review Summary: The customer indicates disappointment, noting that the Pop-Tarts in the box were severely crumbled upon arrival, causing a mess when kids try to eat them. They mention an attempt to contact the seller directly, rather than leaving a negative review, but found no option for this. Images Provided: The seller's image showcases whole, intact Pop-Tarts with vibrant icing designs, highlighting the different flavor options. The customer's image shows Pop-Tarts in a foil wrapper, crumbled into small pieces, rather than the whole pastries expected. Discrepancy and Satisfaction Evaluation: Product Condition: The primary discrepancy lies in the condition of the product. The seller's images and description imply intact, ready-to-eat Pop-Tarts, while the buyer received crumbled pieces that are difficult for children to handle without creating crumbs. Packaging and Shipping Issue: This situation suggests potential damage during shipping or inadequate protection in the packaging. The issue does not appear to stem from the product's quality itself but rather from how it was handled in transit or packed. Customer Satisfaction: The buyer is dissatisfied due to the poor condition of the Pop-Tarts, which affects the intended convenience of the product. The inability to contact the seller to address this issue further compounds their dissatisfaction. Conclusion: The buyer's dissatisfaction is justified based on the received product condition, which does not align with the seller's advertised intact Pop-Tarts. The fault likely lies in packaging or shipping, not in the actual product quality. The buyer's dissatisfaction is justified due to the crumbled state of the Pop-Tarts, which conflicts with the seller's description and images of whole, intact pastries. The fault likely lies with the packaging or handling during shipping, which failed to protect the product adequately. This issue affected the buyer's experience and the intended convenience of the product, rather than reflecting a flaw in the actual product quality.
label: 0:Here seller is at fault
